item.title: Add Contact form to Hugo with Google forms
item.description: Hugo is great for a static site. No need for complecated setups, no database or data tobe hacked. static sites have ton of advantages but when it comes to dynamic content like contact form it is little bit complecated to setup. I’m gonna use Google Forms to setup Contact form on Hugo Static site with custom thank you page on submit. First open Google form and create a form with Name, Email, Subject and Message.
